name: Material Designer
preview: Material designer can create textures that can be used in PBR workflow, even users that doesn't have coding experience can use this software
description: Material designer can create textures that can be used in PBR workflow, even users that doesn't have coding experience can use this software because of the visual scripting language that I created, which uses OpenCV library to do image processing. Since ElectronJS created on top of Chromium engine, I was able to easily integrate code that I wrote in C++.
